channel.title: Law Enforcement on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Law Enforcement on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A power utility is reporting suspected pot growers to cops. EFF says that’s illegal.
item.description: EFF says the “mass surveillance scheme” violates constitutional protections.

item.title: Pro basketball player and 4 youths arrested in connection to ransomware crimes
item.description: Suspects were allegedly involved in a string of ransomware breaches.
